1594330.name: Calm Down, Stalin - The First Person
1594330.description:
NOTICE: This game will be released as an update to Calm Down, Stalin - VR




Sign important papers, answer phone calls, avoid foreign spies, and don't forget to smoke your pipe to relieve stress in this Stalin simulator!

Attention!

This is an adaptation of Calm Down, Stalin - VR for players with no VR sets. You don't need special hardware to play but the level design is not optimized for keyboard and mouse gameplay. The idea is to mimic the virtual reality experience as closely as possible without using VR headset and motion controllers.


  • Base levels and tutorials to help you learn all the mechanics



  • Unusual and absurd levels to just have fun or chill out and smoke your pipe



  • Difficult challenge levels for the most competitive players
1594330.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
